core.Name: Core
core.Description: Managing the overall direction of Rizin Organization, subteam leadership, and any cross-cutting issues. Sets the priorities and release schedule of Rizin and Cutter

cutter-core.Name: Cutter Core
cutter-core.Description: Maintainers of the Cutter project. Responsible for managing Cutter's sub-teams and work groups. Coordinating the work between Cutter's and Rizin's development.

community.Name: Community
community.Description: Coordinating announcements, managing social media accounts, conference arrangements (with a dedicated sub-team), creating content for the different platforms, conduct community surveys, in constant engagement with community members

documentation.Name: Documentation
documentation.Description: Improving and moderating the quality of Rizin and Cutter's community

infrastructure.Name: Infrastructure
infrastructure.Description: Managing the infrastructure supporting Rizin's and Cutter work. This includes CI, website, automation, bridge bots form IM apps, domains

distributions-and-packaging.Name: Distributions and Packaging
distributions-and-packaging.Description: Packaging and assist the package maintainers of Rizin and Cutter for different Linux distributions

package-manager-and-plugins.Name: Package Manager and Plugins
package-manager-and-plugins.Description: Responsible for the development of Rizin Package Manager and the coordination between plugin developers and the development of the plugins toolset.

security.Name: Security
security.Description: Triaging and responding to incoming vulnerability reports in Rizin and Cutter
